import React,{useRef,useState} from 'react' import './../shared/tour-details.css' import { Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' import Booking from '../component/Booking/Booking' import Newsletter from '../shared/Newsletter' import useFetch from './../hooks/useFetch' i const TourDetails = () => { const {id} =useParams() //static data const reviewMsgRef=useRef('') const [tourRating,setTourRating]=useState(null); //fetch data from database const {data:tour}=useFetch(`${BASE_URL}/tours`) //destructure properties from tour object const {photo,title,desc,address,price,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize}=tour; const{totalRating,avgRating}=calculateAvgRating(reviews); //format date const options= {day:'numeric',month:'long', year:'numeric'}; //submit request to the server const submitHandler= e=>{ e.preventDefault() const reviewText = reviewMsgRef.current.value; }; return ( <>

{title}

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating}{totalRating===0 ?( "Not Rated" ):( ({reviews?.length}))} {address}
{city} ${price} / per person {distance} km {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/*=============tour review section========== */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

setTourRating(1)}> 1 setTourRating(2)}> 2 setTourRating(3)}> 3 setTourRating(4)}> 4 setTourRating(5)}> 5
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
Fatima-zahra

{new Date('04-05-2024').toLocaleDateString('en-US',options) }

5
Amazing tour
)) }
{/*=============tour review section end========== */}
) } export default TourDetails
